hero.title: Creating space for the growth of soul, heart and nature
hero.subtitle: Nech Mě Růst (Let Me Grow) is a non-profit organization with a vision of creating a family homestead where we live in harmony with nature, animals and each other.

about.title: About Our Project
about.vision_text: We create a space where traditional wisdom meets modern understanding. A place where every person can grow at their own pace and find their path to harmony with nature.
about.mission_text: We are building a sustainable community based on mutual respect, knowledge sharing and care for nature. We believe that change starts within ourselves and gradually spreads to the whole world.
values: Respect for nature and all living beings
Sustainability and responsibility to future generations
